name: Barricades
description:
Barricades is a bullet-hell shooter with puzzle elements. 

Shoot your way through 15 challenging barricades, but be careful, because destroying certain parts of the barricade too soon may make your job a lot harder!

  • 15 levels
  • 3 difficulties
  • (partial) gamepad support

Full game playable with gamepad, except for entering your name for the highscore table.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys, dpad or left thumbstick to move
  • X or left trigger to shoot
  • Z or right trigger to speed up
